Introduction

Yang Yoseop is a South Korean singer-songwriter and producer under Around US Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group Highlight (formerly BEAST).He made his solo debut on November 26, 2012 with his first mini album 'The First Collage'.

He was formally drafted into the military on January 24, 2019, and was released from active duty on August 30, 2020.
